pr_title: Rename MetaData to Metadata in all of the places

timeline.message: Rename META_DATA to METADATA in all of the places

Rename META_DATA to METADATA in all of the places

Based on https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/pull/54519

Rename META_DATA to METADATA in all of the places

Based on https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/pull/54519

timeline.bodyText: Why the additional indentation changes everywhere? This diverges from our usual style
timeline.author: mfussenegger
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -41,25 +41,25 @@
     public List<NamedWriteableRegistry.Entry> getNamedWriteables() {
         List<NamedWriteableRegistry.Entry> entries = new ArrayList<>(4);
         entries.add(new NamedWriteableRegistry.Entry(
-            MetaData.Custom.class,
-            UsersMetaData.TYPE,
-            UsersMetaData::new
+                Metadata.Custom.class,
+                UsersMetadata.TYPE,
+                UsersMetadata::new
         ));
         entries.add(new NamedWriteableRegistry.Entry(
-            NamedDiff.class,
-            UsersMetaData.TYPE,
-            in -> UsersMetaData.readDiffFrom(MetaData.Custom.class, UsersMetaData.TYPE, in)
+                NamedDiff.class,

replies.bodyText: My bad, this got unintentionally introduced by intellij using the refactoring feature before i switched to sed. However, i reverted the formatting globally, and double checked the full pr. Should be ok now. I should have seen this before you.
replies.author: mkleen
